subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Carlos Boozer has had to recover from a host of injuries that come with being a power forward in the N.B.A., yet he can only imagine what Carmani, his 22-month-old son, has endured in the last year.
snippet: Carlos Boozer has had to recover from a host of injuries that come with being a power forward in the N.B.A., yet he can only imagine what Carmani, his 22-month-old son, has endured in the last year.
